original_title: Flotsam and Jetsam Once in a Deathtime
overview: Live at Spodek, Katowice, Poland - March 8 2008. Setlist: Hammerhead / Me / The Master Sleeps / Swatting at Flies / No Place for Disgrace / Doomsday for the Deceiver / Hard on You / Fork Boy / Never to Reveal / Escape from Within / I Live You Die / Smoked Out
title: Flotsam and Jetsam Once in a Deathtime
